fields.name: Royal Blood (Passive):
fields.value:
During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: I am the Liquor (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to ~~occupy~~ roleblock and redirect abilities.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Debauchery (Night):
fields.value:
Redirect target player to another.
- Conflicting redirections may fail.
